settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure LLM models and API keys for research
settings.defaultLlmDescription: Select the default language model for research tasks
settings.languageDescription: Choose the interface and report language
settings.securityDescription: API keys are stored locally in your database and are never sent to external servers except for the specific API they belong to. For production deployments, consider using environment variables instead.
settings.deleteApiKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {service} API key? This action cannot be undone.

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: Required for GPT based research (default LLM)

research.historyDescription: View and manage your medical research queries
research.noResearchDescription: Start your first evidence-based medical research query using the PICO or PCC framework
research.loadError: Failed to load research history. Please try again.

newResearch.title: Research Query
newResearch.description: Structure your clinical question using evidence-based frameworks
newResearch.frameworkDescription: Choose a framework for structuring your research question
newResearch.picoDescription: Best for clinical questions about interventions, therapies, or treatments
newResearch.pccDescription: Best for scoping reviews, qualitative research, or exploratory questions
newResearch.freeFormDescription: Enter your research question in natural language. The agent will determine the best search strategy.
newResearch.freeFormPlaceholder: Enter your research question, e.g., 'What is the effectiveness of metformin vs SGLT2 inhibitors for type 2 diabetes cardiovascular outcomes?'
newResearch.databaseNote: The agent will search PubMed, Scopus, and Cochrane databases

population.label: Population / Patient
population.help: Who are the patients or population of interest?

intervention.label: Intervention / Exposure
intervention.help: What is the treatment or exposure being studied?

comparison.label: Comparison
comparison.help: What is the alternative or control?

population.label: Population
population.help: Who is the population being studied?

concept.label: Concept
concept.help: What is the phenomenon or concept of interest?

progress.fromDatabases: From PubMed, Scopus, and Cochrane databases
progress.originalDescription: This is the original English report before translation. Medical terminology and citations remain consistent across both versions.

agent.title: Agent Status
agent.translatingDescription: Converting research findings while preserving medical terminology
agent.synthesizingDescription: Analyzing search results and generating comprehensive report
